name: suksma - darker nets of validation - stahlregen's epilectic boogaloo shader
description: suksma - darker nets of validation - stahlregen's epilectic boogaloo shader
milkdrop_raw:

[preset00]

wavecode_0_a=0.990
wave_0_init1=t2 = 0;
wave_0_init2=t3 = 0;
wave_0_init3=t4 = 0;
wave_0_init4=ab = 1;
wave_0_per_frame1=t1 = q1;
wave_0_per_frame2=t2 = q2;
wave_0_per_frame3=t3 = q3;
wave_0_per_frame4=t4 = q4;
wave_0_per_frame5=t5 = q5;
wave_0_per_frame6=t6 = q6;
wave_0_per_frame7=t8 = .07;
wave_0_per_frame8=t7 = 1;
wave_0_per_point1= //myFreq     = log10(log10(sample)+3)*10000;
wave_0_per_point2= //myAltFreq  = time*0.2+myFreq*4-0.8; 
wave_0_per_point3= //fade       = 20*(1.1-myFreq);//*value1 
wave_0_per_point4= t7 = -t7;
wave_0_per_point5= pi = asin(1);
wave_0_per_point6= n = 180;
wave_0_per_point7= rd = 0.075;//+(value1*10+1)*((sample*512)%2)*0.02;
wave_0_per_point8= xx = sin(sample*pi*4+(t7+1)*t8)*0.5 + cos(sample*pi*n)*rd*sin(sample*pi*4+(t7+1)*t8);
wave_0_per_point9= yy = cos(sample*pi*4+(t7+1)*t8)*0.5 + cos(sample*pi*n)*rd*cos(sample*pi*4+(t7+1)*t8);
wave_0_per_point10=zz = sin(sample*pi*n)*rd;
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=d = sqrt( xx*xx + yy*yy + zz*zz);
wave_0_per_point13=d1 = 1;
wave_0_per_point14=xx = xx*d1;
wave_0_per_point15=yy = yy*d1;
wave_0_per_point16=zz = zz*d1;
wave_0_per_point17=
wave_0_per_point18=w = -d*t5*0;
wave_0_per_point19=s1 = sin(t2*1+w);
wave_0_per_point20=s2 = sin(t3*1+w);
wave_0_per_point21=s3 = sin(t4*1+w);
wave_0_per_point22=c1 = cos(t2*1+w);
wave_0_per_point23=c2 = cos(t3*1+w);
wave_0_per_point24=c3 = cos(t4*1+w);
wave_0_per_point25=
wave_0_per_point26=z = (c3*s1*c2 + s3*s2)*xx - (c3*s1*s2-s3*c2)*yy + c3*c1*zz;
wave_0_per_point27=x1 = (c1*c2*xx + c1*s2*yy - s1*zz);
wave_0_per_point28=y1 = ((s3*s1*c2 - c3*s2)*xx + (s3*s1*s2+c3*c2)*yy + s3*c1*zz);
wave_0_per_point29=
wave_0_per_point30=d = sqrt( x1*x1 + y1*y1);
wave_0_per_point31=w = atan2(x1,y1);
wave_0_per_point32=a = 1;
wave_0_per_point33=zoom = 0.5*atan2(a,a+z)*d;//0.4*atan2(a+d,a+z);//0.5*(1/(z+a));
wave_0_per_point34=x = 0.5 + zoom*sin(w);
wave_0_per_point35=y = 0.5 + zoom*cos(w);
wave_0_per_point36=
wave_0_per_point37=pi3 = 3.1415926*2*0.3333;
wave_0_per_point38=t = sample*6.0 + t3*2;
wave_0_per_point39=c=0.5015;
wave_0_per_point40=
wave_0_per_point41=r = (sin(t      )+1)*c;
wave_0_per_point42=g = (sin(t-  pi3)+1)*c;
wave_0_per_point43=b = (sin(t-2*pi3)+1)*c;

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000

shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=x1 = 0;
per_frame_init_2=y1 = 0;
per_frame_1=pi3 = asin(1)*2/3;
per_frame_2=c=time*3;
per_frame_3=monitor =5*sin(time);
per_frame_4=//ib_r = 0.5+sin(c+pi3)*0.5;
per_frame_5=//ib_g = 0.5+sin(c-pi3)*0.5;
per_frame_6=//ib_b = 0.5+sin(c)*0.5;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=ab = ab*0.9 + sqr(mid_att);
per_frame_9=q6 =  + ab*0.0;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=q1 = 0;
per_frame_12=v = 0.01;
per_frame_13=j1 = j1*0.95 + sqr(bass*4);
per_frame_14=j2 = j2*0.95 + sqr(mid*4);
per_frame_15=j3 = j3*0.95 + sqr(treb*4);
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=n = n + j1*0.0052;
per_frame_18=n1 = n1 + j2*0.0052;
per_frame_19=n2 = n2 + j3*0.0052;
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=q2 = n*0.01;
per_frame_23=q3 = n1*0.01;
per_frame_24=q4 = n2*0.01;
per_frame_25=
per_frame_26=k = k*0.99 + sqr(mid_att*2);
per_frame_27=q5 = k*0.00;
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=zoom = 1;
per_frame_30=warp = 0;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    float3 test = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv + 0.01).xyz;
warp_5=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, (uv-0.5)*0.999*(1 - rad*0.01) + 0.5  ).xyz;
warp_6=`    
warp_7=`    float3 check = ret ;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`//    ret = ret + cross(ret,check)*0.1 + test*0.1;
warp_10=`    ret = normalize(ret);
warp_11=`
warp_12=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_13=`    ret *= 1; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_14=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv2;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`    float4 c = float4(1,0.4,0.15,0.1);
comp_6=`
comp_7=`    uv2 = uv + float2(1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_8=`    float gx1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_9=`    uv2 = uv + float2(-1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_10=`    float gx2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,1)*texsize.zw;
comp_13=`    float gy1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_14=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,-1)*texsize.zw;
comp_15=`    float gy2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_16=`
comp_17=`    float3 g = normalize(float3(gx1-gx2, gy1-gy2, 0.14));
comp_18=`
comp_19=`    ret = 0.5 + 0.5*g;
comp_20=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret.xy-0.5)*5);
comp_21=`    ret = ret.xxy;
comp_22=`    ret += 1.15;
comp_23=`    ret *= lerp(ret,ret*(GetBlur3(uv)-GetBlur1(uv)*treb_att),pow(hue_shader.xzy,bass_att));
comp_24=`    ret *= ret;
comp_25=`
comp_26=`    //ret *= 1.5; //old gamma effect    
comp_27=`}
